credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: All Union Agricultural Exhibition 1939
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Circular; scene of large pavilion ornamented at center with Soviet insignia, on left side with map and inscription (in Russian) "Kazan", and on right side with quote from Stalin (in Russian) translated roughly "We don't want a centimeter of anybody's land, but we won't give up any of our own land to anybody; underneath pavilion the inscription (in Russian) "Pavilion D V / All Union Agricultural Exhibition 1929"
name: Plate
